title: Hextech chest not opened?
body:
Will the acquired Hextech chest remain after the season reset? 
If you have x amount and can't/don't want to open it , when the preseason/next season arrives, will you lose them ? 

I know there will be the reset of the obtanaible chests ( you can earn 1 for each champion again in the new season ) but what about the already obtained chests?

replies.body: My guess is because after the loot changes chests can have multiple items and chest with in chests.   So it should be better to hold off and open them later.
Hextech chests won't expire, feel free to hold on to them as long as you like.  If I may ask, why though!
